body:
- Developed edutainment mobile applications for clients.
- Built custom VR and AR installations for holiday and special events around Auckland.
- Created an AR-based interactive storytelling app for a local cultural body using Unity and C#, implementing a dynamic content delivery system to enable weight development of additional content and overcome mobile app size constraints (AssetBundles on AWS).
- Developed an AR-based colouring book app that projected real coloured-in pages onto 3D models, bringing children's drawings to life.
